casebody.data:
SECURITY HEALTH CARE, L.L.C., dba Grace Living Center-Norman, et al., petitioners,
v.
Johnnie BOLER, Personal Representative of the Estate of Cleo Boler. No. 14-1005. Supreme Court of the United States June 1, 2015.

Opinion

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Oklahoma denied.
